name: titles_seasons_seriesid
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool moviesdatabase.
Tool description: MoviesDatabase provides complete and updated data for over 9 million titles ( movies, series and episodes) and 11 million actors / crew and cast members
API description: Fetches the seasons information of a TV series from the Movies Database API using the given series ID.

seriesid.description: The IMDb ID of the TV series for which to fetch seasons information.
